title: Lunchbox Rides In The Trunk Of An Uber For Will It Uber + Monday Morning Confessions
itunes:title: Lunchbox Rides In The Trunk Of An Uber For Will It Uber + Monday Morning Confessions
description:
Lunchbox convinces an Uber driver to let him ride in the trunk. Also, listeners call in to share their Monday Morning Confessions including one wife who is spending money on something behind her husband’s back.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
